import React from 'react'; const FeaturesPage = () => { const features = [ { icon: ( ), title: "Lightning Fast Generation", description: "Generate professional cover letters in under 30 seconds using advanced AI algorithms.", details: [ "Sub-30 second generation time", "Real-time processing feedback", "Optimized for performance", "No waiting queues" ], badge: "Speed" }, { icon: ( ), title: "ATS Optimization", description: "Every cover letter is optimized to pass Applicant Tracking Systems and reach human recruiters.", details: [ "Keyword optimization", "ATS-friendly formatting", "Industry-standard structure", "Compatibility testing" ], badge: "Quality" }, { icon: ( ), title: "Personalized Content", description: "AI analyzes your resume and job description to create highly targeted, personalized cover letters.", details: [ "Resume skill extraction", "Job requirement matching", "Company research integration", "Personal tone adaptation" ], badge: "AI" }, { icon: ( ), title: "Skills Analysis", description: "Get detailed insights into how well your skills match job requirements with actionable recommendations.", details: [ "Skill matching percentage", "Gap analysis", "Improvement suggestions", "Market trend insights" ], badge: "Analytics" }, { icon: ( ), title: "Multiple Templates", description: "Choose from professionally designed templates tailored for different industries and experience levels.", details: [ "Professional templates", "Industry-specific styles", "Creative formats", "Executive-level options" ], badge: "Templates" }, { icon: ( ), title: "Privacy & Security", description: "Your data is processed securely and never stored permanently. Complete privacy protection guaranteed.", details: [ "End-to-end encryption", "No data retention", "GDPR compliant", "Secure file handling" ], badge: "Security" } ]; const fileFormats = [ { name: "PDF", description: "Portable Document Format", supported: true }, { name: "DOCX", description: "Microsoft Word", supported: true }, { name: "DOC", description: "Legacy Word Format", supported: true }, { name: "TXT", description: "Plain Text", supported: true } ]; const stats = [ { label: "Cover Letters Generated", value: "10,000+", icon: "📄" }, { label: "Average Generation Time", value: "< 30s", icon: "⚡" }, { label: "ATS Pass Rate", value: "95%", icon: "✅" }, { label: "User Satisfaction", value: "4.9/5", icon: "⭐" } ]; return (
